name: Coldlight Walker
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, exhaustion, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
book: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.Blinding Light: The walker sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. As a bonus action, the walker can target one creature in its bright light that it can see and force it to succeed on a DC 14+1d6 + 11 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the start of the walker's next turn.
traits.Icy Doom: Any creature killed by the walker freezes for 9 days, during which time it can't be thawed, harmed by fire, animated, or raised from the dead.
traits.Unusual Nature: The walker doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.
